txt.en: The chain-link that sits before you radiates an eerie glow. The link is of crude design and appears to have several sigils etched into it. \n\nPerhaps you should take the link to Ilar to see if he can discover its origin.

'This chain-link appears to be a piece of several larger chains that were sold recently to Treh√©arn, Brenin of the Dievlig. This link seems to have undergone some dark rite to bind a fell spirit to the body of one of our ancestors.'
Wights stir from the cairns of the Bonevales, presenting a terrible threat to all who dwell in Dunland.
Talk to Ilar at his camp in the Bonevales
Ilar is at his camp in the Bonevales.\n\nYou should bring the chain-link you found to Ilar.
